title: Forecast CAGR global digital health market by major segment 2015 to 2020
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 in each Name on the y axis.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is highest at Name Mobile health and lowest at Name EHR/EMR.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 of Name EHR/EMR is 10.25% smaller than the maximum value at Mobile health.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 in each Name on the y axis.
The maximum Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 41.0 is found at Name Mobile health and the minimum is found at EHR/EMR where Name is 4.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 in each Name on the y axis.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is highest at Name Mobile health and lowest at Name EHR/EMR.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 of Name EHR/EMR is 10.25% smaller than the maximum value at Mobile health.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Name in the x axis and Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 in the y axis.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is appeared to be the highest at Name Mobile health and lowest at Name EHR/EMR.
There is a difference of 37.0 between the maximum Name Mobile health and minimum Name EHR/EMR.
Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 at Name Mobile health is 41.0 , second place is Wireless health at 23.0, and thirdly is Average at 21.0.
The highest value 41.0 at Mobile health is almost 1.97 times larger than the average value 20.8.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is 104.0 if we add up values of all Names.
